description: Vegan, gluten-free, protein-packed chocolate fudge pops with a secret healthy ingredient: beans!
name: Black Bean Fudge Pops
recipeIngredient: 1 cup black beans (if canned, well rinsed and drained)
2 cups almond milk ( or other milk of choice)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients into a blender or food processor and blend until completely smooth and creamy.
Carefully pour into popsicle molds, place sticks half way down, and freeze until completely firm - preferably overnight.
To release the fudge pops run the popsicle mold under hot water for a few seconds and wiggle to release.
